name: HSP_CLAIM_DETAIL2
description: This table contains detailed claim print record information for claims associated with the hospital liability bucket.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the claim record associated with a single hospital liability bucket.

columns.name: SA_ID
columns.description: This column holds the service area for the claim.

columns.name: INACTV_CLP_YN
columns.description: This column has a value of yes when the claim is inactive.

columns.name: CLAIM_ACCEPT_DTTM
columns.description: This column holds the instant the claim was accepted.

columns.name: SG_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The payer ID for this claim.

columns.name: SG_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The plan ID for this claim.

columns.name: SG_CVG_ID
columns.description: The coverage ID for this claim.

columns.name: INVOICE_NUM
columns.description: The invoice number for this claim.

columns.name: SG_PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient ID for this claim.

columns.name: SG_GR_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The guarantor account ID for this claim.

columns.name: HOSPITAL_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The hospital account ID for this claim.

columns.name: HLB_ID
columns.description: The liability bucket ID for this claim.

columns.name: SG_PROV_ID
columns.description: The billing provider ID for this claim.

columns.name: SG_REF_SRC_ID
columns.description: The referring source ID for this claim.

columns.name: SG_REF_SRC_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: SG_LOC_ID
columns.description: The location for this claim.

columns.name: SG_DEP_ID
columns.description: The department ID for this claim.

columns.name: SG_POS_ID
columns.description: The place of service ID for this claim.

columns.name: SG_CLM_ID
columns.description: The claim information ID used by this claim.

columns.name: SG_RQG_ID
columns.description: The requisition grouper ID for this claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The account class used to evaluate this claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_BASE_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The base account class used to evaluate this claim.

columns.name: MIN_SERVICE_DT
columns.description: The minimum service date for this claim.

columns.name: MAX_SERVICE_DT
columns.description: The maximum service date for this claim.

columns.name: UB_FROM_DT
columns.description: The uniform billing claim from date.

columns.name: UB_THROUGH_DT
columns.description: The uniform billing claim through date.

columns.name: CLAIM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The claim type.

columns.name: CLAIM_FRM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The form type. This is either paper or electronic.

columns.name: TTL_CHRGS_AMT
columns.description: Total charges amount.

columns.name: TTL_DUE_AMT
columns.description: Total due amount.

columns.name: TTL_NONCVD_AMT
columns.description: Total non-covered amount.

columns.name: TTL_PMT_AMT
columns.description: Total payment amount.

columns.name: TTL_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: Total adjustment amount.

columns.name: UB_BILL_TYPE
columns.description: Type of bill.

columns.name: HM_HLTH_BILL_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: Home Health bill type.

columns.name: UB_SG_GRP_NUM
columns.description: Group number.

columns.name: CNCL_CLAIM
columns.description: Indicates whether this is a cancel claim.

columns.name: REPL_CLAIM
columns.description: Indicates whether this is a replacement claim.

columns.name: UB_CVD_DAYS
columns.description: Covered days.

columns.name: UB_COINS_DAYS
columns.description: Coinsurance days.

columns.name: UB_NON_CVD_DAYS
columns.description: Non-covered days.

columns.name: UB_PRINC_DX_ID
columns.description: Principal diagnosis.

columns.name: CNCL_CLAIM_CODE
columns.description: The value code associated with this claim if it is a cancel claim.

columns.name: REPL_CLAIM_CODE
columns.description: The value code associated with this claim if it is a replacement claim.

columns.name: SG_ALTPYR_CLM_YN
columns.description: Flag used to indicate that claim is for alternate payer.

columns.name: FILING_ORDER_C_NAME
columns.description: This column holds the filing order position of the claim coverage at the time claims were processed.

columns.name: CLM_EXT_VAL_ID
columns.description: The ID of the claim record.

columns.name: SG_TREAT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the treatment plan that is associated with the claim.

columns.name: UB_COMB_CLM_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: If this column is set to 1, the claim is a combined claim.

columns.name: REND_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column holds the claim level rendering provider.

columns.name: RESEARCH_ID
columns.description: This column holds the research study for the claim.

columns.name: SRC_INV_NUM
columns.description: In PB, this column holds the original invoice number during refresh and resubmit. In HB, this column holds the invoice number associated with the primary claim in a crossover scenario.

columns.name: CLAIM_TAX_AMOUNT
columns.description: Gross tax amount at a claim level, this is the sum of all the tax amounts sent on a claim.

columns.name: DRG_XR_AMOUNT
columns.description: The Diagnosis Related Group expected reimbursement amount. This will be stored for accounts billed with Diagnosis Related Group that need tax calculated specifically for the Diagnosis Related Group without any outliers or add-ons, as compared to the total expected reimbursement on the claim.

columns.name: DRG_TAX_AMOUNT
columns.description: The Diagnosis Related Group tax amount. This will be stored for accounts billed with Diagnosis Related Group that have tax calculated based on expected reimbursement values.

columns.name: CLAIM_APEC_OUTLIER
columns.description: This item stores the Adjudicated Payment per Episode of Care Outlier amount for a claim.

columns.name: SNF_CLAIM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item identifies the type of Skilled Nursing Facility claim produced.

columns.name: DEPT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of department. For Norway claims, this identifies the department as a GP Office, Trust, or Municipality.

columns.name: CLM_REBILL_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the reason why we sent the claim again to payer. It holds onto the rebill reason with the highest precedence from the category list.

columns.name: CLM_REBILL_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the user who resubmitted the claim.

columns.name: CLM_REBILL_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: FAC_ACTOR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the type of facility. For Norway claims, this identifies the facility as a GP Office, Trust, or Municipality.

columns.name: BENEFIT_RECORD_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the benefit (BEN) record used to calculate the patient responsibility.

columns.name: PREDICTED_PAY_DATE
columns.description: The predicted payment response date for a claim based on historical trends for the payer.

columns.name: SUGGESTED_FOL_UP_DATE
columns.description: The suggested initial follow-up date for a claim based on historical trends for the payer.

columns.name: CLM_CLOSED_TIMELY_YN
columns.description: Denotes if the claim closed prior to its Suggested Initial Follow-up Date, whereby it was no longer outstanding to insurance.
